summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented (mobile search form gets margin-block-end:auto; Home tabs header wrapper padding removed). REQ-4 appears implemented via TagPage overriding Tabs margin (className="mb-0"). REQ-5 is claimed implemented in the diff summary text, but the actual PondPage code snippet is truncated before the relevant section. REQ-3 (Tags/Tag Hub mb-4 removal) is not evidenced by any shown change.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the Tags page (Tag Hub), remove the `mb-4` margin-bottom from the tabs header divider container (the div described as `class="border-b border-border bg-background mb-4"`) so there is no bottom margin applied by that element.
missing_requirements.reason: No Tags/TagHub page change is shown in the provided diff summary; none of the modified file snippets include the Tag Hub header divider container.
